Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you
feeling?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's do our best
today as well!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. My, look at those
bags under your eyes! Are you not sleeping? You
mustn't push yourself so hard!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How are you feeling?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How is every little thing?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How's the farm? I hope
you're not overworking yourself!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Is all your work for
the day completed?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. How are you?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. It's awfully late,
don't you think? Sleep is the key to health and
long life, so if you're tired, go to bed!

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）

Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a warm and lovely day today, isn't it?
<PAGE>
It's the best kind of day for a walk, but I'm
just...not up to that these days. I've been feeling
so very tired lately...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a shame about all this rain today. But I'm
sure the crops are enjoying it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sun's so hot today... I don't feel like doing
anything.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't mind the rain cooling things down, but
the humidity! It hurts my joints.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a lovely Indian summer day. I wish I didn't
hurt so much, or I'd go for a walk...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Rain in the fall is hard on these old bones...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The air is so clean and fresh today. It feels nice,
but I can't stay in the cold too long.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If this snow piles up too high, I don't know what
I'll do. I can't shovel it myself anymore.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, my. You shouldn't go out in this weather,
dearie.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This snow is going to pile up for sure. I hope
someone will shovel it for me.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...<MYNAME>, I hear you're courting someone.
Young love is so wonderful!
<PAGE>
Not to rush you, but I'd love to meet your child
someday soon...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like to come here and chat with Otmar now
and again.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here from time to time for my medical
checkup.
<PAGE>
Dr. Marian may dress a bit strangely, but he's a
very good doctor. And Angela is as kind as they
come, once you get to know her.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fritz is certainly working hard, isn't he? He may
be a bit careless every now and again, but he's a
fine young man.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These days, I can't get out very much, so I'm
always grateful for visitors. I do so love to chat
like this.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rumor has it there are spirits in this forest, but
I've never seen them, myself. How about you,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I'm walking in the forest, the fresh air on
my skin is just so pleasant...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a lot of life in that river. It's a popular
spot for fishing.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oooh, ow... Walking all the way out here always
makes me tired and stiff...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The river here is great for fishing. My late
husband often brought fish home for me, back
in the day.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here to see Fritz sometimes.
<PAGE>
It's a bit far to walk for me, but seeing him
always lifts my spirits.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hoeing all the fields is so hard these days...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hoeing all the fields is so hard these days...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm growing sugar cane, but it's...quite a task.
Maybe someone else might want it...?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hoeing all the fields is so hard these days...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hoeing all the fields is so hard these days...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can grow rice in a paddy here...but it's too
big for me. Also, this place is a bit of a walk.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I've been getting tired so easily lately, even
though I'm only walking a little bit. I wonder if
I'm falling ill...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I feel well, I try to go out and walk as
much as I can.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We had four farmers in Oak Tree Town before
you came. You're the fifth.
<PAGE>
We count on everyone to work hard around here.
All of us, including you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you making pickles?
<PAGE>
If you're growing lots of vegetables, you should
make some pickles while you're at it. They're
tasty, and they keep a long time.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farm work is hard, but I'd say it's rewarding.
<PAGE>
When you wear yourself down to make your
crops rise up, then all that exhaustion just floats
away.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For me, the people of Oak Tree Town are my
family.
<PAGE>
Otmar and I, especially, have been friends for a
long time. He and I enjoy a good cup of tea
together.
<PAGE>
But I don't go out these days. So I haven't seen
him for a long time.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been working as a farmer for...oh, quite a
while. But I've always paced myself, and
because of that, I can still keep on working.
<PAGE>
...Yes, no rush, taking it easy... That's my way.
<PAGE>
It's never made me rich, but I've always had
enough food to eat and enough time to enjoy it.
<PAGE>
So since I can't work these days, I'm taking it
easy at home.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was born and raised this town. Never did learn
much about other places.
<PAGE>
I've never even thought about travelling, really. I
suppose I just belong here.
<PAGE>
But my son sends me letters sometimes. Those
always make me want to go see him.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen, <MYNAME>, I'm glad you came to my
house.
<PAGE>
You're a hardworking farmer, and you've been so
kind to me...so someday, I'd like you to take
over my farm.
<PAGE>
I'd never force you to, of course, but please do
think it over.

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, are you really giving this to me? It's my
favorite. Thank you!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this for me? What a thoughtful gift. Thank
you!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're giving me this? I like it. Thank you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for such a wonderful gift. But you
really don't have to be so generous.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...This is for me...? Well, since it's from you, I'll
take it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, this is...a gift for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh, n-no, it's...I'll take it. No sense in letting it
go to waste.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm...I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. I'm sure this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> is well-made... I've
just never had a taste for it.
<PAGE>
B-but since you made it for me, I'll take it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's glowing gold. You don't have to be so
kind to me, you know, but thank you for being
so thoughtful.
Let's not give her a present now.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, it feels like it's been ages since we've
talked. I don't know if I could accept a gift after
all this time...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, thank you for offering, but two in one day? I
don't think I'd feel right about that.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present for me?! Oh that's
right, it is my birthday! My, you remembered
that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh my, what a lovely <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
These are my favorite. Thank you!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, how nice! ...Did you say "a birthday
present"?
<PAGE>
Come to think of it, it IS my birthday...! You
remembered? Thank you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, now this is nice! I like it. ...A birthday
present? For me?
<PAGE>
Oh, of course. Thanks. I'd completely forgotten.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a birthday present for me? Thank you very
much.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Is this for me...? A birthday present...
Well, I'll take it, then. Thank you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What? A birthday present? Oh, you want to
give me this? Well, far be it from me to turn
down a present.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I'm surprised you remembered my birthday.
I'm happy about that.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>O-oh, I'm sorry. I'm sure you meant well with
this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... I've just never
had a taste for it at all.
<PAGE>
Oh? It's a birthday present for me?! ...That's a
surprise. I'd completely forgotten.
<PAGE>
Well, since you went through all the trouble,
here, I'll take it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a birthday present for me? My, look at that
golden glow. Thank you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, what a cute rabbit. And that nose, the
way it sniffs! So adorable.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's cute, all right, but I wouldn't trust it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's an ermine, isn't it? I hear they come
around sometimes.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, that's adorable.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I don't think I've ever seen that kind of rabbit.
Such nice fur.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a cute little chick. Take good care of it,
won't you?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice chicken. I'm sure it produces
delicious eggs.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, what an adorable dog. Are you keeping
him?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That dog is certainly cute, but...isn't he a bit on
the heavy side?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, that dog looks like a sharp one.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice little dog, but he might be a bit too
husky.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, what a cute cat. Its face is so pretty.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that cat is cute, but a bit too roly-poly.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what a beautiful cat. Its fur looks so nice.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, this cat has a pretty face, but a round
body.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, that's a pretty flower. Ah, it's the Flower Fair
today, yes...? Thank you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, such a beautiful blue feather... My husband
gave me one just like it, many years ago. Thank
you for reminding me.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a pretty ring... You have someone you
want to give it to, yes? No time to lose, then;
you'd best get to it!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like this wrapping! It's cute. I can't wait to
see what's inside.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, I like the wrapping. It's nice. I'm curious
what's inside.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is?
<PAGE>
...Happy birthday! This is from me. Please, take
it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is...your birthday if I remember correctly.
Happy birthday.

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Long time no see.
<PAGE>
It's good that you're so busy with work. But
please stop by for a chat every now and again.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Those blue pants suit you well. They seem
comfortable for work, too.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like that apron. It's cute. The red and white
combination looks very pretty on you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look a bit chic today. Quite a striking look
for a farmer.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Those orange pants are stylish. They go with the
white shirt.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're wearing a sailor uniform today? You
look nice in anything.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're wearing a sailor uniform today? I like
that pink scarf.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm, I've never seen that kind of outfit... Where is
it from?
<PAGE>
Well, regardless, it looks very cute and
comfortable to work in.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm, I've never seen that kind of outfit... Where is
it from?
<PAGE>
Well, regardless, it looks very cute and
comfortable to work in.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a nice raincoat. It goes with those
pink boots.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like that sleeveless shirt. The color is very
cute.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where are you going today with those fancy
clothes?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm, that outfit... You look like some foreign
prince. And a stylish one, too.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute skirt. The vest looks good on
you, too.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's an ethnic outfit from some other country,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
A skirt for men... A "kilt," I think they call it?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, when did you become a doctor? What about
your farm...?
<PAGE>
...Huh? You're "cosplaying"? I have no idea what
you're talking about. You're just full of surprises,
aren't you?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like that outfit. Looks pure and innocent.
But isn't it what nuns wear? Why are you
wearing it?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is that you, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
...Don't scare me like that. Anyone would get a
shock if you talked to them in that outfit. Why
are you wearing it, anyway?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You're <MYNAME>, right? That's a cute outfit,
but where did you get it?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You're <MYNAME>, right? Why are you
wearing a dog costume?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You're <MYNAME>, right? That's a cute outfit,
but where did you get it?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's going on?! Did something happen? Why
are you wearing armor?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a nice straw hat. It's perfect for farm
work.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like white hats. They look clean. Especially on
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that hat is so well made. It looks just right
for those extra hot days.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat you're wearing looks perfect for
farmers. It suits you well.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, so cute! Looks like a cat.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my, so adorable! It looks good on you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha! For a moment, I thought some foreign ruler
had stopped by.
<PAGE>
Where did you get that, anyway?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White-framed glasses tend to look a bit strange
to me, but they look good on you.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, are you playing pirate today? Be careful not
to get hurt, okay?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong with your eye? Oh, it's just for
fashion? Well, that's fine, then.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I see crops growing, it lifts my heart so
much that I forget how hard the work is.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Animals know when you're good to them, and
they'll thank you for it in their own way.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Zzz... Zzz...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's getting late. You should go get some sleep.
I'm about to hit the hay, myself.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry. Could you wait until I finish eating
this?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful bench. And white is my favorite
color.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what is in that barrel...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder what is in that wooden box...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All the farms around here used to have
scarecrows. But not so much these days.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a bit old, but it's still a nice wagon.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Back in my day, we used to ship goods in boxes
like this one instead of going through the Trade
Depot.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That lamp has an eastern flavor. I like it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A long time ago, there was a loyal dog, and it
waited for its master at the station even after he
died.
<PAGE>
That statue was built for that dog, I believe.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are there fish in that pond?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if we can get some water from the
well... Well water is cold and delicious.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this plaza. It's cozy. This is the best place
to take a rest when I'm out walking.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice, cozy plaza. It's good to take a
break here when I'm out on a walk.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once, in a blizzard, I made a snow cave. You
can actually keep pretty warm inside one of
those.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why is there a Sakura Country New Year's
decoration here...?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look at that bamboo decoration. There's a
name for that, isn't there? "Shishiodoshi" or
something?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love white flowers.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My husband used to grow bonsai plants. Ah,
memories...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry blossom trees are beautiful, especially
when they scatter.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like maidenhair trees in the fall. It's like
everything glows gold.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's one fancy flower basket.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wouldn't it be grand to have a party around this
beautiful cherry blossom tree?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like maidenhair trees in the fall. It's like
everything glows gold.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White fences help the town look cleaner.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For some reason, wooden fences give me such
a warm feeling...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This light color scheme looks so clean and
refreshing. It almost feels like a shower for my
heart.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This dark color scheme makes me feel tough
and strong. Don't you feel the same way?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahh... This place brings back memories. All of
Oak Tree Town used to be just like this.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel this warmth here, like the spring sun.
Makes me want to just sit down and watch the
world go by.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, it's so energetic here, like summer. I'll
never get bored with these decorations around.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Can you get ginkgo nuts from this maidenhair
tree?
<PAGE>
I used to pick them up all the time. Ah, the good
old days...

Content.VardId: 町の発展MSG　//特定住人専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has become so famous. I see people
coming from all over the world these days.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Compared to back then, this town is so much
busier nowadays.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a small town, and a bit lonely sometimes,
but I like it. Life here is nice and slow.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've lived here quite a while now, and I've seen
the population grow, bit by tiny little bit.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a small country town, but all of us farmers
can make it grow if we work together and put
our minds to it.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never imagined the town would ever be this
famous. I'm glad I lived long enough to see it...

Content.VardId: 町ブラ専用MSG　//モブ専用会話
メイド、下僕用MSG　//モブ専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_EDDA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your allowance for today. Use it well.

Content.VardId: アイテム入手メッセージ
